name: ertrd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0

stmt.origin: mp2and(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c4), wbr(c4, c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c4))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c4, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c4), wbr(c4, c1, c2)), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c4))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c4, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c4), wbr(c4, c1, c2)), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))

stmt.origin: ertr(c0, c1, c4, c2, c3, w0)
stmt.pretty: ertr(c0, c1, c4, c2, c3, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c4), wbr(c4, c1, c2)), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wer(c1, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c4))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c4, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wer(c1, c3))

comment: A transitivity relation for equivalences. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
